issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: image views with border width + border color of white have grey residue

comments.body:
{html}

no grey seen when using this code, closing as resolved

var win = Titanium.UI.currentWindow;
Titanium.UI.setBackgroundColor('#FFF');
var imageView = Titanium.UI.createImageView({

        borderColor:'#FFF',
        borderWidth:10,
    image:'http://www.appcelerator.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/06/titanium_desk.png',
    width:261,
    height:178,
    top:20
});

needs testcase

{html}
